node.title: Cleo Smith abduction case adjourned after accused kidnapper Terence Kelly faces court
node.alt: Terence Kelly gets out of a prison van.
node.description: The man accused of abductingÂ four-year-old Cleo Smith from her family's tent appears in a Carnarvon court in Western Australia, with his case adjourned for seven weeks.
node.content:
["The man accused of abducting four-year-old Cleo Smith from her family and keeping her for 18 days has made another appearance in court, but there has been no indication of whether he will defend the allegations against him.", "Terence Darrell Kelly, 36,\u00a0appeared in Carnarvon Magistrates Court\u00a0via video link\u00a0from the maximum-security Casuarina Prison, wearing a light grey t-shirt and with his long hair tied back from his face.", "His lawyer Kate Turtley-Chapel, who appeared via audio link from Perth, said she had received some material from police and was expecting more next week.", "Ms Turtley-Chappel requested a seven-week adjournment which was granted by Magistrate Benjamin White.", "Mr Kelly was not required to speak and only nodded to confirm his name.", "He made no application for bail and was remanded in custody until he appears again via video link on January 24.", "
Cleo Smith found at house
", "Mr Kelly\u00a0has been held at the prison since he was flown to Perth the day after he was charged with forcibly taking a child under 16.", "Mr Kelly was arrested in Carnarvon in the early hours of November 3, around the same time police stormed their way into the locked house where he lived and found Cleo awake and playing with toys.", "That was 18 days after she vanished in the early hours of the morning from her family's tent at the Quobba Blowholes, about 70 kilometres away.", "", "
Terence Kelly boards a plane in Carnarvon after being taken into custody last month.\u00a0(Getty Images: Tamati Smith\u00a0)
", "A massive land, air and sea search began immediately, but as the days and weeks passed no trace was found of her and concerns grew for her safety.", "At the time she was found, police said Mr Kelly had been identified as a suspect only hours earlier.", "Forensic investigators spent the next seven\u00a0days examining his home and taking away bags\u00a0of items for further testing.", "", "
Terence Kelly's\u00a0grandmother Esther Mingo was at the Carnarvon court to see her grandson appear on the video screen.(ABC News: Jon Sambell)
", "Mr Kelly's grandmother Esther Mingo was in court to see her grandson appear from prison.", "Ms Mingo said she would continue to support her grandson.", "She said she had been very distressed to hear of his arrest.", "Another relative, believed to be an aunt, was also in court for his appearance but declined to comment outside the court.", "When asked how Mr Kelly's family was going, she replied: \"how do you think the family's feeling?\" before telling the media to leave her alone.\u00a0"]
